name: Uziverse Demo
description:
Lil Uzi Vert Crashed his UFO Into 'Eternal Atake : The Dark World' Planet

While he's passed out, Planet Creatures take his Girlfriend JT,  Your Mission is to find JT and Defeat The King Of 'The Dark World' to Escape the planet.

Controls: Move Right - D/RIGHT Move Left - A/LEFT Jump - SPACE/UP Skip Dialog - RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON Shoot - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON DOWNLOAD THE GAME
